GLTF Opacity
============


Apply oApacity to the model

GLTF Opacity Attributes
------------------------

|Attribute|Type|Default|Description|Required|
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
|opacity|number|```1```|Opacity value to apply to the model. 1 is fully opaque, 0 is fully transparent.|Yes|
